node.excerpt: Late to the party. I am reworking my GitHub Pages with Gatsbyjs. This is based on  gatsby-starter-blog .
Background Some projects require MYSQL-python or mysqlclient to access a mysql database. And let’s say that mysql db is not local or…

frontmatter.title: How to pip install MYSQL-python/mysqlclient on macOS
frontmatter.description: Some tweaks to pip install MYSQL-python/mysqlclient on macOS, without installing mysql
